.. Passbolt master file, created by passbolt team rocket!
   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Dec 04 17:28:00 2012.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome
#######

The Passbolt developer documentation cookbook, is an openly editable documentation
project. We hope to maintain a high level of quality, validity and accuracy for 
the documentation.

Getting started
===============

Api
------------

Get started with the :doc:`/api/api`.
You'll learn the basics of Pasbsolt.

Internationalization
--------------------

Learn how to translate the application with the :doc:`/i18n` section

Jenkins CI
--------------------

Everything about the :doc:`/jenkins` environment used for continuous integration.

    :title lang=en: .. Passbolt Documentation
    :keywords lang=en: doc home,passbolt,team rocket ftw
